Token.Abstract: Delegate protocol to specify supported devices based on their EAAccessory name and firmware revision
Test that a device with the given name and firmware version is supported

Parameter.Name: deviceName
Parameter.Abstract: the name of the device as reported by the EAAccessory name property

Parameter.Name: firmwareVersion
Parameter.Abstract: the firmware version as reported by the EAAccessory firmwareRevision property

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if this app supports the given firmware version
